mapper.sql: id, question, reference_answer, ai_src, interviewer_id, is_on, create_time, updated_time
mapper.select:
select ql.id as questionLibId, ql.question, ql.reference_answer as referenceAnswer, ql.ai_src as aiSrc, ql.interviewer_id as interviewerId, ql.is_on as isOn, i.ai_name as interviewerName, ql.create_time as createTime, ql.updated_time as updatedTime from question_lib as ql left join interviewer as i on ql.interviewer_id = i.id where 1=1
and ql.question like concat('%', #{question}, '%')
and i.ai_name like concat('%', #{aiName}, '%')
order by ql.updated_time desc
